Steve Pendleton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Pendleton 0 Steve Pendleton (September 16, 1908 – October 3, 1984) was an American film and television actor, often cast in the role of law-enforcement officers. Steve_Pendleton ( September_16_,_1908 – October_3_,_1984 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor , often_cast in the_role of law-enforcement_officers .
